name: Sea Empress
description: A regal Naga warrior-queen who leads from the front, commanding the fury of the ocean while bolstering her forces.

abilities.name: Tidal Fury
abilities.description: Empowers weapon with ocean's might. Each attack deals bonus water damage and splashes to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Crushing Wave
abilities.description: Sends forth a wave that damages and slows enemies while healing allies.

abilities.name: Serpent Ward
abilities.description: Summons a serpent ward that attacks enemies and provides vision.

abilities.name: Tsunami
abilities.description: Ultimate: Summons a massive tsunami dealing heavy damage and stunning enemies.

texts: Bow before the Empress of the Depths.
